patterns: How can ı go to Bedroom from the living room?
I am in the Living room and ı want to go Bedroom
I wanna go to the Bedroom from Living room
Can you tell me, How can ı go to Bedroom from the living room?
responses: After exiting the living room, if we go straight to the left, the first room on our left is the bedroom.
